Sentencas: Metal oxides containing the divalent zinc cation (Zn2+, d(10) electronic configuration) as an essential element are promising candidates for oxide-ion conductors, because there are several good oxide-ion conductors containing other d(10) cations, such as Ga3+ and Ge4+.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: In the present study, we have found a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors, BaY2CuO5-type (BaCuY2O5-type) BaR2ZnO5 compounds (R = rare earths).
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: BaR2ZnO5 compounds with a BaY2CuO5-type structure were found to be good candidates for oxide-ion conductors by the bond-valence method.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: BaR2ZnO5 compounds (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Ho) were synthesized by solid-state reactions, and their electrical conductivities and crystal structures were investigated.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: Rietveld analyses of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, and Ho) using synchrotron X-ray powder diffraction data gave good fitting for the BaY2CuO5-type structure.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: BaHo2ZnO5 had the highest total electrical conductivity in air among BaR2ZnO5 compounds (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Er, Ho).
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: Oxide-ion conduction was confirmed for BaHo2ZnO5 by electrical conductivity measurements conducted under various oxygen partial pressures.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors

Sentencas: Neutron powder diffraction data of BaHo2ZnO5 were analyzed by the Rietveld method, and the oxide-ion conduction paths were investigated by the bond-valence method.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of BaR2ZnO5 (R = Sm, Gd, Dy, Ho, and Er)-a new structure family of oxide-ion conductors
